snippet: Mr. Paul took credit in Iowa for a spike in sales for Ms. Clarkson, who had recently endorsed him. A closer look by Billboard magazine contradicts that claim; and where she had an increase - in digital downloads - a discount may be the better...
abstract: Mr. Paul took credit in Iowa for a spike in sales for Ms. Clarkson, who had recently endorsed him. A closer look by Billboard magazine contradicts that claim; and where she had an increase - in digital downloads - a discount may be the better explanation.
lead_paragraph: Attention politically opinionated pop stars: plugging a presidential candidate may not help your sales, especially if that candidate is Ron Paul.

headline.main: Can Ron Paul Move the Charts? Kelly Clarkson May Not Prove It
